articles.title: ESA's Euclid mission: Scientists reveal first images of dark universe - Mint Lounge
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Euclid telescope will investigate how dark matter and energy have made our Universe look like it does today
articles.content:
Earlier this week, scientists revealed some of the first photos taken by the European Space Agency (ESA)s Euclid space telescope, which was launched in July this year.

articles.title: Gaza faces imminent typhoid, cholera outbreak, health bodies warn - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Lack of safe water and disruption to health and sanitation services are raising the threat of infectious disease outbreaks.
articles.content:
Health organizations are warning of an imminent public health crisis in the Gaza Strip, where disruptions to health and water systems are raising the risk of disease outbreaks.
